text:
"Conservatives cannot actually be honest and admit that wokism is what happens when people are serious about the equality thesis, because they themselves accept—or at least pretend to accept—the claim that all groups are innately the same." 
-- Cofnas for reality (unironically).
Talking about conservative dumbness is just a blackpill introduction to the history of religion.
"... all non-racism-based cultural explanations for race differences have fatal problems that most intelligent people immediately recognize." ncofnas.com/p/why-we-need-to…
... This isn't a difficult point to understand, but it's manifestly a difficult point for the right to hold onto.
Wokeness is the Anglo original sin, our total depravity, and it doesn't end short of extreme eschatology. ...
... Which is fine, because extreme eschatology inundation is happening pretty much exactly now.
... There's no mass conversion out of Wokeness before the end of the world -- so aim for that.
... This is my footnote to Cofnas, obviously, since he seems to miss the apocalyptic implication of his otherwise persuasive argument. ncofnas.com/p/why-we-need-to…

"... we must destroy the taboo against hereditarianism, and teach people not to seek scapegoats for differences that are the product of nature." -- Exactly. All we need is a religious crisis roughly two orders of magnitude greater than the Reformation. ncofnas.com/p/why-we-need-to…

"Science advances one funeral at a time." -- Max Planck
(Not a life-extension fanatic, I'm assuming. Probably no one should be.)
